title: What are the most popular websites and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Youtube, Wikipedia and Facebook all get the highest search traffic by far. The full leaderboard can be seen by looking at the Ahrefs blog here: Top 100 Most Visited Websites by Search Traffic (as of 2019) However, in this list are normal blogs. Whilst Youtube and Wikipedia are almost glorified blogs that offer an extremely niche service, be it videos or knowledge, there are websites such as Forbes and BusinessInsider that could still be described as a blog. So how do these blogs rank among staples and stalwarts such as Youtube and Indeed etc. The answer is value You need to give your readers and visitors something of great perceived value that no other website has given before. Whether that is tips on how to become rich or insider secrets for affiliate marketing, as long as you are giving everyone knowledge or something that makes them feel good, you will keep getting traffic and recurring visitors. Articles of value get featured on bigger blogs. You start ranking on Google. Before you know it, you’re surpassing the blogs that once featured you prior. As you keep pumping out consistent quality articles (and maybe sell a homemade product as well such as a course), the traffic flows in like a reservoir over a burst dam. This is a message to everyone looking to make it big with their website. The key is value. Give the people something they would regret never knowing. Improve their quality of life. Feed them knowledge. Change their lives. That is the key. Hope this helped Cam
